body.name: Marsail Twin Mattress, 10-inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress, Medium-Firm Mattress in a Box for Pressure Relief & Support, Breathable Cooling Twin Bed Mattress with Zippered Cover

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Unmatched Comfort & Support】Our gel memory foam mattress features a medium-firm feel that cradles your body to offer superior pressure relief and optimal support. Whether you sleep on your side, stomach, or back, this 39″x 75″ twin mattress will leave you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated each morning.

【Cleaner Sleep Environment】This twin mattress is rigorously tested to meet the highest standards of skin-friendliness and sleep quality. Crafted with premium memory foam material, the twin bed mattress will help you sleep soundly in a sanctuary of pure relaxation like never before.

【Stay Cool All Night Long】Forget sleepless nights caused by mattress heat. Our gel memory foam mattress is engineered with cooling gel and advanced breathability to promote optimum airflow that whisks away excess heat and moisture. Enjoy cooler, refreshing nights of uninterrupted slumber.

【Easy to Clean and Always Fresh】With an easy-to-remove zippered cover, the 10-inch twin mattress can stay spotless and pristine for long-lasting use. Simply remove the cover and wash it to renew the freshness of your mattress for maximum comfort.

【Convenient Mattress in a Box】Our 39″x 75″ twin bed mattress is compressed for packaging to arrive in the most compact form. Unboxing is a breeze, allowing you to have your new bed set up in no time. Please allow a minimum of 24 hours for the mattress to expand to full size.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Marsail Memory Foam Mattress | Embrace Ultimate Sleep Comfort

The mattress features a full-length zipper that allows for easy cover removal so you can keep your bed feeling as fresh and clean as possible. Simply unzip and remove the cover for washing to renew your sleep space for maximum comfort.

The Marsail memory foam mattress is expertly engineered to cradle your body with luxurious softness while providing unparalleled support for better spine alignment and pressure point relief. The integrated cooling gel ensures optimal airflow to keep you comfortable without excess heat and moisture.

Our gel memory foam mattress is rigorously tested to meet the highest standards of skin-friendliness and sleep quality. Crafted with premium memory foam material, you can sleep soundly knowing that your twin bed mattress is made with the utmost care and consideration.

Previous page Next page Indulge in ultimate sleep comfort with this 10-inch memory foam mattress from Marsail. Experience a whole new level of relaxation thanks to exceptional breathability designed to keep you cool all night long. Wake up feeling rejuvenated and refreshed like never before.
NOTE: Please unzip the cover for faster expansion and allow up to 48 hours after opening the mattress for any potential odor to dissipate and adjust to its final feel once the foam settles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars better than what i expected
reviews.reviewText: i was nervous purchasing this because of the price but it was all i could afford right now. this mattress is AMAZING. so comfortable for the price, it’s not the most supportive mattress but for the price it does the job. no weird smells when opening it and letting it rise. shipping was quick too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice and comfortable too!!! Great price!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable after a couple months still sleeping great for the money cant beat it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A MUST-HAVE for side sleepers!!!
reviews.reviewText: This mattress topper is insanely comfortable!! I had purchased one of those bed-in-a-box mattresses about 2 years ago and never really loved it. I sleep on my right side all of the time, and I was getting very bad muscle spasms on my left side. I was actually sleeping with a heating pad draped over my side to try and at least limit the spasms as best I could. I assumed it was from sleeping in the same position night after night. Then I researched it and found that side sleepers like me need a mattress that isn't too firm. So rather than buying a whole new mattress I purchased this topper. I unfurled it mid-morning and by bedtime it was ready to go. WOW!! Talk about an amazing night's sleep! Not just that but when I woke up my body wasn't sore at all, which was so welcome since I also suffer from very chronic back pain. It didn't solve my back pain since it's aggravated by other activities and by being tall, but when I lay on my bed now I just feel completely enveloped with comfort and relief. As for the pain in my side, that's almost completely gone already. I simply can't believe what a difference this 3" topper has made to my well being.As for the odor, my bed is made using a bamboo mattress pad, then a fitted sheet over that. After 5 days of sleeping on this I can still smell a very slight odor from the topper. I am hyper-sensitive to odors because I am a chronic migraine sufferer, so when I lay down my ears start to ring which is usually a sign a migraine is coming. But it hasn't yet caused a headache so to me the odor isn't enough to put me over the edge in that way. And I'm assuming that over time even this slight odor will dissipate. Perhaps since I didn't air the topper out for the recommended 48 hours after opening it and I then encased it in both the mattress pad and fitted sheet that it may take a little more time for the off-gassing to cease.One thing I'm thinking might happen is the topper may eventually bow in where I sleep but I can always turn it 180 degrees around, and then after it bows in again turn it over and continue to rotate it.I recommend you take a chance on this! I'm not being paid for my review with any perks, it's my genuine opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought two twin xl mattresses so I could make a daybed that converts to a king bed for guests. The mattresses have fabric with grip on the bottom, so when we lay them next to each other, they don’t slip apart. Then I just put a king size mattress topper on them to hide the seam between them and done! Guests kept telling me the bed was super comfy, and I thought they were just being nice, but now after sleeping on it myself a few times, I can confidently say it’s a very comfy mattress. My husband and I are both bigger people and we find the 10 inch mattress still supports us without any complaints. It’s a nice medium firmness, but I would imagine a super small individually would find it pretty firm. I still think even then, adding an additional mattress pillow top eliminates any complaints if you don’t like the firmness. My husband loves them so much we are talking about buying another one to replace our mattress in our room. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is just as I expected
reviews.reviewText: Got this for our cabin. expanded as expected (don't shortcut on the 2 days to let it expand). It is a 4 in comfort - but I'm very happy with it. It is a little more firm than I would like, but it was great to just get it delivered, opened the box and done. No having to get a truck and haul it in. I will buy another one for the other room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Marsail Twin XL Gel Memory Foam Mattress
reviews.reviewText: Super comfortable mattress with gel memory foam is AWESOME!!! This mattress is sooo comfy, forms and supports your body. I have no problem falling asleep quickly… It also works great with an electric bed frame. I completely recommend it….

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable mattress but…
reviews.reviewText: We’ve had the mattress for almost 2 months now. We enjoy having a bigger size mattress and for the most part the mattresses very comfortable. Since we’ve had it for a while, we’ve noticed that one side seems more firm than other side is squishier/softer. I’m reading the mattress three stars, because I wish both sides were the same amount of firmness.
